qas.question: What are two economic issues faced by the Congolese government?
What two exports has the Congo begun producing recently?
When was the Congo allowed back into the Kimberley Process?
Who presides over a stable peace?
When were oil prices at a record low?
What country allegedly smuggled diamonds out of the Congo?
What is not a Congolese export?
When was the Democratic Republic of Congo excluded from the Kimberly process?

context: The <b3_0>current administration<b3_0/> presides over an uneasy internal peace and faces difficult economic problems of <a0_0>stimulating recovery and reducing poverty<a0_0/>, despite record-high oil prices since <b4_0>2003<b4_0/>. <a1_0><b6_0>Natural gas<b6_0/> and diamonds<a1_0/> are also recent major Congolese exports, although Congo was excluded from the Kimberley Process in <b7_0>2004<b7_0/> amid allegations that most of its diamond exports were in fact being smuggled out of the neighboring <b5_0>Democratic Republic of Congo<b5_0/>; it was re-admitted to the group in <a2_0>2007<a2_0/>.
